name: graphql-relay
description: A library to help construct a graphql-js server supporting react-relay.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly && npm run prettier:check
scripts.build: rm -rf lib/* && babel src --ignore __tests__ --out-dir lib && npm run build:flow
scripts.build:flow: find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__tests__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/lib\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.cover:lcov: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report lcovonly node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha
